column3: If you're updating the comments here anyway, it'd be nice if you changed them so that those function documentations are picked up by doxygen (it currently shows no doc for them at all https://dev.visucore.com/bitcoin/doxygen/base58_8h.html#a2a7a6efa38bda9181b9a28ab3e675bea ).\n\nYou can do this by using [javadoc-style docblocks](http://www.stack.nl/~dimitri/doxygen/manual/docblocks.html) above the
OK perfect, I'll make that update.\n
Just pushed a commit with javadoc-style docblocks. How does that look?\n
Looks good to me, ACK after squashing into one commit\n
@rxl Any chance of get these squashed?\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/4e9667b844ac1c5fbb8934ec63fe17d2757f8767 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
